resources.string: This is detail page in which you can read articles and also share using the Floating Action Button

Swipe to access the other articles also this article can be seen in indicator below. Click on Show More to reveal full article, Note that reveling full article may cause device to work hard so it might not be able to cache the full state after two swipes!
Touch on any item to continue
This is an app For reading the feeds from internet right inside your phone
Dark theme Disabled. Enabling Dark theme might save batttery in some screen types
Disable touch on Page View Indicator if you are having problems dots Indicator
Enable touch on Page View Indicator to enable quick navigation by touching the dot available at bottom
